description:
Hello Bristol Gophers 👋!

We're continuing with the workshops! We will be alternating them with talks, hoping to create a theme that connects the two from here on.

Theme: Building a classifier from scratch in Go

This task is based off the fantastic talk by James where he showed us how to build a classifier from scratch.

On top of this theme we encourage you to bring your own problems and we can work through them together. We encourage you to treat this as office hours; as in pop in any time if you get stuck, ask us questions and we'll do our best to help you out. We can use breakout rooms if you fancy working as a pair/group.

Plan:
- 18:00-18:05 - short introduction to the repository
- 18:05-onwards - work on classifier (breakout rooms if needed)

📣 We are looking for help with organising! If you or anyone you know would like to help, give us a shout!

📣Help us grow! JetBrains offers free licences to meet-ups with attendance greater than 30. If we can reach this, we will apply and be handing it out as a prize at events.
title: Go(ne) online - ML Workshop
